mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_log (id, station_real_code, board_real_id, token, auction_times_id, auction_times, bs_id, board_real_name, auction_time, enable,local_auction_id,auction_car_id,bid_fee) values (#{id}, #{stationRealCode}, #{boardRealId}, #{token}, #{auctionTimesId}, #{auctionTimes}, #{bsId}, #{boardRealName}, #{auctionTime}, #{enable},#{localAuctionId},#{auctionCarId},#{bidFee})
mapper.update:
update tbl_auction_log
station_real_code = #{stationRealCode},
board_real_id = #{boardRealId},
token = #{token},
auction_times_id = #{auctionTimesId},
auction_times = #{auctionTimes},
bs_id = #{bsId},
board_real_name = #{boardRealName},
auction_time = #{auctionTime},
enable = #{enable},
where id = #{id}
